help.name: help
help.title: Aethel Bot
help.about: Enhance your Discord experience with AI chat, weather updates, reminders, and more useful features.
help.features_content:
**Fun Commands** - 8ball, cat/dog images, and more
**AI Integration** - Powered by OpenAI and other providers
**Reminders** - Never forget important tasks
**Utilities** - Weather, help, and productivity tools
**Multi-language** - Supports multiple languages
help.dashboard: Check out our [dashboard](https://aethel.xyz/login) to manage To-Dos, Reminders and custom AI API keys

embed.title: Aethel commands
embed.description: Here are all the available commands

remind.name: remind
remind.remindyou: You asked me to remind me about: {message}

errors.base: An error occurred while setting your reminder. Please try again later.
errors.failedtosave: Failed to save your reminder. Please try again later.
errors.invalidformat: Invalid time format! Use combinations like: 1h30m, 45m, or 2h
errors.providevalidchars: Please provide a valid message (1-1000 characters)
errors.atleastoneminute: Reminder time must be at least 1 minute!
errors.notlongerthanaday: Reminder time cannot be longer than 24 hours!

remind.contextiwillremindyou: I'll remind you about this message in {time}

whois.description: Look up WHOIS information for a domain or IP address

whois.notvalid: Please provide a valid domain name or IP address.

request.inprogress: You already have a request in progress. Please wait for it to complete.

ai.reset: Your AI chat history has been reset.
ai.defaultapi: Switched to default API. Your custom API key has been cleared and the default model will be used.

modal.title: Enter your API Credentials
modal.apikeyplaceholder: To stop using your key: /ai use_custom_api false

ai.nopendingrequest: No pending request found. Please try the command again.
ai.apicredssaved: API credentials saved. You can now use the `/ai` command without re-entering your credentials. To stop using your key, do `/ai use_custom_api false`
